metadata.title: Ore genesis of the Essakane, Falagountou and Sokadie Gold deposits: Oudalan-Gorouol Greenstone Belt, Burkina Faso, West African Craton
metadata.author: Bontle Nkuna

metallogeny.alteration: mesothermal lode gold, thermal-aureole gold, intrusion-related gold

structures: NNE-NE trending mylonite and shear zone

metallogeny.alteration: sericite is the most developed wallrock alteration

geochronology.evidence: Free native gold observed in a sample

metallogeny.alteration: Sericite is the first alteration mineral to form
